metadata.title: CVE-2018-7667 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Adminer through 4.3.1 has SSRF via the server parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7667` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

adminer - 4.5.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adminer package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0-1').
